title: Premium Spiral Notepad, A5 Size, 100 Pages, College Ruled, Hard Cover
highlights: Durable hard cover protects your notes.
Spiral binding allows for easy page turning.

description.header: Stay organized with this premium spiral-bound notepad, perfect for students and professionals.
description.paragraph: This high-quality notepad combines durability with functionality. The hard cover provides protection for your notes, while the college-ruled pages help maintain neat, organized writing. The spiral binding ensures pages lay flat and turn smoothly.
bullets: Durable hard cover protects your notes from wear and tear.
Spiral binding allows for easy page turning and flat writing surface.
A5 size (5.8" x 8.3") for perfect portability.
Premium quality paper prevents ink bleed-through.
Back pocket for storing loose papers and documents.
Ideal for students, professionals, and everyday note-taking.
